title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. B, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 48 - On-premises Liquor And Wine Licenses

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. B, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 48

Restaurants and Special On-Premises Establishments and

Special On-Premises Establishments. Statutory authority: Alcoholic Beverage Control Law, §§2, 64, 64a, 81a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
